description: This file defines a React functional component 'NoteTopbar' that renders a top action bar with buttons for creating a new note, saving, and deleting. It accepts props to handle these actions and control button states.

methods.name: NoteTopbar({ onDelete, onNew, onSave, saving, canDelete, canSave })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a top bar with action buttons (New, Save, Delete) for notes.
